activities: FogLogic will allow European residents, including those from Switzerland, to create accounts on its site to use its cloud based analytics tools.  To do so, a user will have to submit his or her name, email address, company name, telephone number and possibly other information.  The data is collected to create accounts, monitor usage and communicate with users.  The information is collected at the time an account is created.
personaldata: Name, email address, telephone number, company name and possibly other personal information.  The company is in Beta mode at this time so it simply wants to make sure it is US-Swiss Safe Harbor compliant.
privacyprograms: Applying for self-certification under the Privacy Shield Framework.
recoursemech: FogLogic has contracted with the Better Business Bureau to be its IRM.
